column2: "Nsisi nsɛn yɛ ekyiwadze ma EWURADZE: Na pɛrpɛr nkerii dze
column3: ɔyɛ n’enyigyedze."
nna enyimguase so ba: Na ahobrɛadzefo dze nyansa nye hɔn tse."

column2: "Tɔɔtsenyɛfo hɔn emudzi begya hɔn kwan: Na nkontompɔtwafo dze
column3: hɔnara hɔn ndabraba bɛsɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Adzenya dodow nnkotum agye nkwa wɔ ebufuw da mu: Na ndzeyɛtsenenee dze
column3: ɔgye nkwa fi owu mpo mu."

column2: "Nyia odzi mu no ne tsenenee na ɔbɛtsentsen no kwan: Naaso omumuyɛfo dze
column3: ɔbɔhwe ase wɔ nankasa n’emumuyɛ mu."

column2: "Tɔɔtsenyɛfo hɔn ndzeyɛtsenenee bɛgye hɔn nkwa: Na nkontompɔtwafo dze
column3: wɔbɛkyer hɔn wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn mbusubɔ mu."

column2: "Omumuyɛfo no wu sɛɛ n’enyidado nyinara: Nkankaara dza ɔdze hyɛɛ n’ahonya mu no."

column3: wɔgye no fi ɔfona mu
column4: Na omumuyɛnyi ebesi n’ananmu ehu amandze."

column2: "Ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi dze n’ano sɛɛ ne nyɛnko: Na atseneneefo dze
column3: wɔdze nyimdzee bɛgye hɔn."
kurow no dzi ehurusi: Mbom sɛ emumuyɛfo hera dze a

column2: "Wɔnam tɔɔtsenyɛfo hɔn nhyira do na wɔma kurow do: Na wɔnam emumuyɛfo ano na wɔbɔ no."

column3: onnyim nyansa: Na nyimpa ɔwɔ ntseasee dze
ɔda esumasɛm edzi: Na nyia ɔwɔ nokwardzi sunsum no dze
ɔman hwe ase: Na apamfo dodow mu
no ho bɛhyehye no: Na nyia okyir egyinamudzi no
ɔwɔ enyimnyam: Na nyimpa enyimpifo dze

column2: "Nyimpa mbɔbɔrhufo yɛ nankasa ne kra yie: Na nyia ɔyɛ etsiɔdzen no
column3: ɔhaw noara no honam."

column2: "Omumuyɛfo nya ndaadaa apaabɔdze: Mbom nyia ɔpɛ ndzeyɛtsenenee no dze
column3: ɔwɔ akatua a osi pi."
ɔbɔkɔ nkwa mu: Na nyia ɔka emumuyɛ do no
column4: ɔyɛ dze nya noara no wu."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔyɛ akoma mu akɔnkyew no
column3: wɔyɛ EWURADZE n’ekyiwadze: Na hɔn a wodzi mu wɔ hɔn mu no
nyimpa bɔn nnkɛfa noho edzi: Na ɔtseneneenyi n’asefo dze

column2: "Mbrɛ sika edwindze tse wɔ preko n’ahwen mu no
column3: Dɛmara so na ɔbaa ɔhoɔfɛfo a onnyi adwenmutsewee no tse."

column2: "Atseneneefo apɛdze ye ara: Naaso emumuyɛfo enyidado dze
column3: ebufuw a."
mbom ɔdɔr mbordo; Na obi wɔ hɔ a ɔkam adze do kyɛn mbrɛ ɔsɛ
ɔbɔdɔ seradze: Na nyia ogugu nsu no
column4: wobogugu no so no do nsu."

column3: ɔman no bɛpaa no: Nhyira bɛba nyia ɔtɔn no etsifi."
ɔhwehwɛ enyimpa: Na nyia ɔhwehwɛ mbusubɔ dze
ɔbɔhwe ase: Na ɔtseneneenyi dze
onnkenya hwee efi mu: Na ɔkwasea bɛyɛ onyansafo n’akowaa daa."

column2: "Ɔtseneneenyi n’aba yɛ nkwa dua; Naaso nyia onya akra no yɛ onyansanyi."
column3: " #11.30: NAASO NYIA ONYA AKRA NO YƐ ONYANSANYI: Tsetse akyerɛwfo no bi ka dɛ: Ɔkakabemfo dze ɔsɛɛ akra."
sɛ wobotua ɔtseneneenyi mpo kaw wɔ asaase do a: Nna burburbur omumuyɛnyi na ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi!"
